topic.title: How to Avoid Wrapping of Title Text Under the Chapter and Sections Number

body.p: By default the number of the chapter and sections is on the same line with the title content. If the title is long, the text wraps under the chapter number.

p.codeblock: 4.5.5 This is a long title text that wraps.

body.p: If you need the text to avoid wrapping under the numbers, like this:
body.codeblock: 4.5.5 This is a long title text that wraps.
body.p: Then you have to set the transformation parameter args.css.param.title.layout to table. In this way the number is placed in a cell, and the rest of the title content in another cell.
